text: Hi Ra’ed, good to e-meet you. Hope you’re well. I saw your prospela application and it looks amazing, I wish I was as focused and driven as you when I was 14 :blush:. Please feel free to ask me about anything at all. Speak soon. Daffer

Hello Daffer, A pleasure to  *C++ you too! I'm glad you like my entry, so far my ambitions went well, since I wrote that application I learn * to an intermediate level and made my first game with it (trailer below) but as I'm sure you're aware, it isn't easy to, alone, get an honoured place in the games industry, so I hope to use my skills to be an android app maker part time, my full time aspiration falls upon a few of your skills (which in all honesty all together look simply incredible!!!). I want to be a tech designer/industrial designer, I don't know how to pinpoint it but simply think of it like this

when you imagine the future chances are you think of self-taught tech prospering in the background, Simply put, I want to be among those who have the privilege to actually invent and (not engineering wise, but aesthetics wise, you know with tools like SketchUp and Revit) design those wonders.
so was hoping to ask you questions about the job of industrial design/tech design
(typo, the bold bit should say "C++ you too! I'm glad you like my entry, so far my ambitions went well, since then I learnt c++")

In reply to "I wish I was as focused and driven as you when I was 14" Thank you, that flatters me, but in all honesty Its nothing to let down about, a new valuable skill can be obtained in a matter of weeks! Especially in this age of self education

attachments.fallback: [March 18th, 2019 7:14 PM] raedinbox: The trailer for my game, Sling. made in C++ and powered by Cocos2d-x. Please do not publicize it at all. I wouldn't want to loose the competition I'm entering it into
